Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Paving the way for the Heisman Trophy candidate Andrew Luck are a pair of N.F.L. prospects, guard David DeCastro and tackle Jonathan Martin of Stanford.
snippet: Paving the way for the Heisman Trophy candidate Andrew Luck are a pair of N.F.L. prospects, guard David DeCastro and tackle Jonathan Martin of Stanford.
